name: Giggly Goo
description:
This game is made in 72 hours as a submission to Ludum Dare 49: Unstable

You are a slime tamer who is trying to catch lots of slimes. However, these slimes are pretty insecure. 

Pay attention to them when they ask or you might just lose all of them!

Don't forget to share with us your high score!

Controls:

/   Rotate
 /  /  /   Position
 /    Drop
 Click to pet

---

It's a Tetris with a twist!

  
Make a row of slime to clear them.

Click a slime when they are upset before they run away

---

Game design: @CrescentOdyssey

Art, programming, & slime sfx: @mscarrotcake

Bgm: playonloop

Other sfx: mixkit soundbible
